111.content: Okay. Now choose a species.
111.title: Female

1111.content: Not like this is interactive is going anywhere, but there's more to anthros than Foxes, Wolves and Dragons alright?
1111.title: Hold up now!

11111.content: What type of canine you want?
11111.title: I still want Canine.

1113.content:
Carla is an anthro cobra snake. She is 21 years old. She has smooth light green colored skin while her belly is a dark green color. Her eyes are a light blue color. Her normal height it 5 feet 7 inches. She has a slim figure (127 pounds). Her tail is 4 feet long. Her flesh has a dark blue color that glows when it's night time. She has normal sized breast, her right one has a piercing on her nipple. Her forked tongue is 2 feet long.

She is a shy person but she isn't very bright. She has a calm and relaxed personality, which means she is rarely worried about something that happens to her. She try's to find the best in situations and enjoy it when something goes wrong.

She spends most of her time to herself so she doesn't know that many people.
1113.title: Carla the cobra

choices: go to the lab, it might be worth it
11131.content: it is 7:00 am on a Friday, Carla slowly gets out of bed and gets ready go to her job as the manager of a fancy hotel that is about an hour away from where she lives. As she leaves she gets her mail and finds an ad from a research lab for a test subject, she reads it and it says very little about what it is but she finds that they pay twice the amount she makes in a week. does she?
11131.title: day one with Carla

info.brief_description: This is a story when a anthro, feral, or taur character you or I make becomes huge
info.description:
This is the first story for me on this website. The story is that a character I or you make becomes huge for whatever reason and grow to huge sizes ( 1 mile tall being the smallest) and it goes on forever or at lest as long as it can.

Rules: no toilet stuff
no real people in the story
smallest height is 1 mile tall
only female and herm characters
vore is allowed
one giant character for each story
character can be an anthro, feral, or a taur
try to keep adult stuff to a minimal.
hyper is allowed, just don't make it the whole premis of the story
try to make it so that whatever you add on is good enough grammar that everyone knows what the word is (example: car carr)

Other then that that's it. Have fun.
info.pretty_title: The day of the giant anthros
